FDB entry control sub-commands
EMAC LLD Module API » EMAC LLD IOCTL Macros

EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_CTRL sub-commands

The following macros are sub-commands that to be used when issueing emac_ioctl with EMAC_IOCTL_CMD set to EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_CTRL

#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_ADD   ((uint32_t)1U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE   ((uint32_t)2U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE_ALL   ((uint32_t)3U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE_ALL_AGEABLE   ((uint32_t)4U)
 

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_ADD   ((uint32_t)1U)

Add FDB entry

#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE   ((uint32_t)2U)

Delete FDB entry

#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE_ALL   ((uint32_t)3U)

Delete all FDB entries

#define EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_DELETE_ALL_AGEABLE   ((uint32_t)4U)

Delete all ageable FDB entries
